sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './Form.css'; export default class Form extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { nome: '', idade: 0, casado: false, cidade:'', estado: '', } this.handleInput = this.handleInput.bind(this) } handleInput({target}) { const { name } = target const value = target.type === 'checkbox' ? target.checked : target.value this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { const { handleInput } = this return (
Formulário React
) } }
